text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Huff, huff... D-don't leave mebehiiiind!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: You're late, Spe! The hell were you<n>doing?!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
I'm so sorry! Suzuka's big race is<n>today, so I didn't get
any sleep...

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Shouldn't it be Suzuka who has<n>trouble sleeping?

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
If your tardiness ends up getting<n>Suzuka disqualified, you'll
be in biiig<n>trouble.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Ehehe...

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: All right, ready to go?

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Yes.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: It's been several months since the<n>Takarazuka Kinen.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Today, Silence Suzuka is scheduled to<n>run in the autumn
Tenno Sho at the<n>Tokyo Racecourse. She's currently<n>the
favorite to win.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: Suzuka!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Air Groove... and Fukukitaru?

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: Your cheerleading squad is here,<n>Suzuka!

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
I've got to pay you back eventually<n>for the Takarazuka
Kinen, after all. I'm<n>taking this opportunity to study every<n>
move you make.

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
Really? Was that what you said? I<n>could've sworn you
were all gung ho<n>about cheering for her when you<n>invited
me.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
W-well, that's what I mean!<n>Observation can be a form of
support,<n>you know.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: In any case, I want to be the oneto beat you, so you'd better not lose.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Yes, I promise I'll be the first past the<n>finish line.

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
I shall also be praying for your<n>success! May the gods be in
your<n>favor!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Ehehe... Let's hope they're in a good<n>mood.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: Well... this is as far as I go.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: Well... this is as far as I go.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
But remember, I'm always with you,<n>along with my hopes
and dreams.<n>Now go see the scenery you're<n>seeking!

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
But remember, I'm always with you,<n>along with my hopes
and dreams.<n>Now go see the scenery you're<n>seeking!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
I'll run towards that scenery, enjoy<n>the view, and give you
a sight to<n>behold. After that...

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: I promise I'll return to you.
choice_data_list: And I know you will! Go get 'em!
And I know you will! Go get 'em!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Right!
